topics.body: Okay so someone with better understanding of sonic lore than me: is gamma at all the same character as omega or is omega just total replacement
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5553fb236368721e40d40300#post_5553fb236368721e40d40300
Different characters
At the end of Gamma's story, [spoiler]the bird that is inside him is set free, and returns to his family[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5553fb236368721e40d40300#post_5553fb236368721e40d40300
Gamma's story is about him freeing his brothers and himself from Eggman.
Omega's story is "Le's blow Eggman's shit up."

And iirc, originally, back in Sonic Heroes, Gamma was going to be the third member of Team Dark, but they decided to create Omega to avoid ruining Gamma's story.

[spoiler]but then they decided to put him in Sonic Battle on the GBA, but who here bessides me even knows that exists?[/spoiler]

[spoiler]It's implied that the birds in the robots were part of his family, as well as the one that followed Amy[/spoiler]
